ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hlhilsbase.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | hlhilsbase.l | |- L = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | hlhilsbase.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` L ) |
| 4 |  | hlhilsbase.u | |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) |
| 5 |  | hlhilsbase.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 6 |  | hlhilsbase.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 7 |  | hlhilsbase2.c | |- C = ( Base ` S ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) |
| 9 | 1, 8, 2, 3 | #P_dvhsca | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> S = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> S = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> C = ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 8, 4, 5, 6, 13 | #P_hlhilsbase | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> C = ( Base ` R ) ) |
